name: Nanofights
description: Nanofights is an “Online Trading Card Game”, made for fast gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: no 3D needed

reviews.review_text: Pros: It's free Cons: It's free
I guess its an ok card game. I didnt quite get the way i am supposed to play but i ll give it a try.
I recommend this game to Hearthston players
Got this game at a giveaway. Its a good game, but lacks of players. If they keep giving away some games for free like this, maybe they increase the number of players and it becomes a great game.
old school trading card game... the tutorial can be better...
old school trading card game... the tutorial can be better...
got it free from orly... thats about all i can say about that!
Got a free copy of the game from  orlygift.com  awdawdawd

Actually it's a decent (trading card) game, but the overall quality is extremely low. I think only the die-hard fans of this genre can keep playing it for more than 1 hour. Most people will want to uninstall it immediately.  Oh and did I tell you there is almost no one playing online at the moment?
A bad trading card game. Even a free to play trading card game is better than this.
- Java - No trading cards - No achievements - Poor graphics - Third party registration - 'Server offline - Please wait a moment'  ...and a 10 euros price at the time of this review. Seriously ?
Just, no, this game is terribad.
The hearthstone kill!!!!...wink wink   *Got a free copy of the game from  orlygift.com
Just don't waste ur money on this game...
Extremely dull interface, choppy animations, no background music, bad tutorial, no players to play against, high price tag.  So no, I not recommend this game.
